attributes.action: MP's elected on a LEAVE manifesto that vote to stop/slow Article 50 must resign
attributes.background: All MP's who were voted into Parliament on either Labour or Tory Manifesto's to LEAVE the EU, who now attempt to stop us doing so by trying to extend or revoke Article 50 should be made to resign and seek re-election as they deceived voters in 2017.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
